topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554a67f1636872012e8c0a00#post_554a67f1636872012e8c0a00
ESPECIALLY fcuk Google. They've brought me down the most: I've lost $23000 because of them.

But NOBODY is worse than TESLA. I fought with them for the entirety of this game and I was lucky to get away with even a MINISCULE profit of like maybe $700 after constantly being down $30000. I won a major waiting game there, not much but it was _something._
